## Where are we?

```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressWarnings(library(leaflet))
library(magrittr)

m <- leaflet(width = "100%") %>% setView(lng = 5.767249, lat = 45.190590, zoom = 12)
m %>% addTiles() %>% addMarkers(lng = 5.767249, lat = 45.190590, popup = "Meeting location") %>% addMarkers(lat = 45.198496, lng = 5.748917, popup = "This is me!")
```
